name: Little Igor
description:
It is late and Igor got lost in the forest. 

He tries to find his way home, but is chased by ghosts. 

Help him get home.

Can you find the hidden star ?

A,D / arrow  for walking left and right

W  / arrow for jumping

hold SHIFT to run

SPACEBAR to shoot.

YOU CAN DOUBLE JUMP

 

I have never made a platformer game, so I thought this Trijam would be a good opportunity to do so.

I learned how to use parallax scrolling in godot, apply gravity and how to make a character jump. Worth it !
